column2: This building houses our amazing external talks - make sure you don't miss out on great opportunities!
As your new second home Zepler is where you will find the majority of our high-tech computer labs - open until 11pm (you can even play games in here!!)
A great student pub on Portswood High Street
An even better student pub in Portswood - the name is no coincidence!
Ice cream and other sinful pleasures
This is a big big park - the biggest in Southampton! (it's very big)
This is the only pub/bar we have on Highfield campus - Karaoke Thursdays!
Night club right in the middle of the city centre!"
AKA SUSU Building - here you can find the Cinema, Piazza (food) and most of our societies!
Gym and other sports!
This is where you go for important stuff & for help - acommodation, various documents, fees & funding and many more!
This is the University post office - you can send mail out, buy stamps for your collection, and even collect mail!
It's a bank!
It's a bank!
Coffee shop - for those long days in the Zepler computer labs!
Fancy coffee shop & food
The university library - it's full of books (and PCs) - you can study there!
This is the second campus!
Affectionately known as the 'Palace of Dreams', Jesters is a student favourite on Portswood
As Southampton's best gay club you will probably end up spending a lot of time here, regardless of your sexual orientation
